input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Midweight Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Short'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Raisin Men's Pro Jersey'
  - Name='WoPedal Mafia Men's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Men's Core Lightweight Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Pro Team Training Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha EF- Education Giro d'Italia 2025 Jersey'
  - Name='Alyssum Rapha Core Jersey'
  - Name='Rapha Classic Flyweight Jersey'
  - Name='Maillot Ligero Rapha Core Hombre Navy XS'
  - Name='MAAP Men's Aether Pro Air Jersey 3.0'
  - Name='Man Jersey Santini Stone'
  - Name='Santini Pirelli Unisex Slim Fit Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Evade X Pro Air Jersey 2.0'
  - Name='MAAP Eclipse Pro Race Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille Gt Jersey C2'
  - Name='Man Sportful Giara Jersey'
  - Name='Santini x UCI World Champion Italy 2025 Men's Slim Fit Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Paris Roubaix Short Sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Sportful Monocrom Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Women's Sugar Short Sleeve Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Pro Team Midweight Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a cycling jersey meant for performance, similar to the Core Jersey, but with long sleeves and midweight fabric, which differs from the likely short sleeve lightweight design of the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts are a completely different type of cycling garment than a jersey, so low relevancy despite being from the same brand and cycling category.
Also a cycling jersey from the same brand with 'Pro' model implying performance features similar to the Core Jersey; likely very similar in function and construction.
A generic pro cycling jersey likely similar in function and construction, but less brand-specific information reduces confidence.
Another pro jersey for men likely similar in function and use, indicating decent relevancy despite a different brand.
Same brand and product name as reference, presumably a typo or variant spelling, highly relevant and likely identical product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Pro Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and a 'Pro' level jersey but long sleeve differs from probable short sleeve Core Jersey; functionally similar but some variation in design.
Same brand and pro jersey focus but designed for women; similar function and construction but gender-specific fit may differ.
A core lightweight cycling jersey with similar wording and purpose as the reference, though a different brand; likely very similar in product type and features.
Training cycling jersey from a high-performance line; similar function but distinct from the Core Jersey focus on general cycling and comfort.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha EF- Education Giro d'Italia 2025 Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Special edition race jersey designed for a specific event; may have distinct design and performance features so somewhat less relevant than general core jersey.
A core jersey from Rapha, similar category and function to the reference product, though from a different brand.
Lightweight cycling jersey with classic styling; related in function but possibly a different fit or fabric weight than the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Maillot Ligero Rapha Core Hombre Navy XS
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Core lightweight jersey for men, essentially similar to the reference product though possibly differing in details; relevant cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Men's Aether Pro Air Jersey 3.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-performance men's cycling jersey focused on breathability; similar use and construction but different brand and possibly higher performance tier.
Generic men's cycling jersey by Santini; relevant as a cycling jersey but less detail implies less confidence in similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Pirelli Unisex Slim Fit Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Unisex slim fit cycling jersey designed for performance and fit, similar in purpose but potentially different cut and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: MAAP Evade X Pro Air Jersey 2.0
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end pro air cycling jersey focused on aerodynamics and lightweight, similar as a cycling jersey but may be more race-oriented than the Core Jersey.
Pro race-focused cycling jersey, similar product type but may prioritize race performance over general use like the Core Jersey.
Assos cycling jersey designed for general training and comfort; relevant cycling apparel but from a different brand and model.
Men's cycling jersey by Sportful; relevant in category but less known or described so lower confidence in similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini x UCI World Champion Italy 2025 Men's Slim Fit Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Race or champion edition cycling jersey with slim fit; relevant category but specialized edition may differ from general core jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini Paris Roubaix Short Sleeve Jersey Man
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Specialized race event cycling jersey; relevant as short sleeve cycling jersey but event-specific design reduces general relevancy.
Generic cycling jersey from Sportful; relevant product type but less detail on features or performance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Women's Sugar Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Women's short sleeve cycling jersey; relevant in usage and construction although gender specific and from a different brand.
